effect.x-y: Removes major status effects and confusion from every Pokémon in the user’s party.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Removes major status effects and confusion from every Pokémon in the user’s party.

short_effect.x-y: Cures the entire party of major status effects.
short_effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Cures the entire party of major status effects.

flavor_text.x-y: The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the status conditions of all the party Pokémon.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the status conditions of all the party Pokémon.
